API documentation¶

This is the definite source of information for developers, besides having a look at the actual source code. Each class and public method should be fully documented.

Submodules¶

An alphabetic list of the submodules available within the trepr package. The actual documentation is split in pages for each submodule, respectively. For a short description of each of these modules, see below.

  • trepr.analysis module
  • trepr.dataset module
  • trepr.io module
  • trepr.plotting module
  • trepr.processing module

Module contents¶

trepr package

Package for reproducible and traceable analysis of trepr data.

Available modules¶

trepr.dataset
Organise dataset, consisting of data and metadata, and the metadata.
trepr.io
Import trepr raw data in Freiburg Speksim format including its metadata.
trepr.processing
Process data in datasets.
trepr.analysis
Analyse data in datasets.
trepr.plotting
Plot data in datasets.
